title: Für Elise
author: VD
content_html: Congratulations to the daughter of a certain member of the Dread Ilk. She made it to the third round of the National Spelling Bee and got both of her words in the round right, but unfortunately didn’t make the cut for the semifinals for reasons I won’t pretend to understand. Well done, and congratulations to her and her parents.
